abstract: In an effort to curb money market funds, a Plan B is considered. | The New York Fed sold the last of its A.I.G. bailout bonds. | Jesse Eisinger uncovered a TARP move that wouldn’t help taxpayers. | And Andrew Ross Sorkin said investors in health care were betting on President Obama. A look back on our reporting of the last week’s highs and lows in finance.

lead_paragraph: In an effort to curb money market funds, a Plan B is considered. | The New York Fed sold the last of its A.I.G. bailout bonds. | Jesse Eisinger uncovered a TARP move that isn’t helping taxpayers. | And Andrew Ross Sorkin said investors in health care were betting on President Obama. A look back on our reporting of the last week’s highs and lows in finance.

headline.main: Week in Review: A Defeat for Schapiro
